markdownRemark.html: Weâ€™re all somewhat unstuck in time. In these scenarios, it can be difficult to make progress. Many milestones and activities are gone, work is difficult to come by. Find ways to be more effective with time and avoid simply spinning tires in the sand. Take a better approach rather than digging too far.
